about_the_game:
Now the second volume of Siluman Fantasy the Novel is Out!
It's about Minoru and his cheerful(?) Monster Girls companions!
===========================================================
Minoru has finally gotten used to his life in the world of monsters. At least he had assumed that until Alice gives him a book and cryptic information retaining to his Grandfather. Now he is on a quest a secret quest alongside Lime and Ovis to find out the mysteries of the book as well as why the Lustkeeper is acting so odd. With some luck, he may even be able to meet a few new monster girls along the way.
===========================================================
This book is a collaboration with Heidi Fisk based on the Siluman Fantasy Game
